channel.title: Commas on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Commas on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Grammar School!
item.description: I will admit that I’m not the best at grammar (heck, I still have to make sure I type grammar instead of grammer, but that’s just a spelling issue :)), and other times, there is just some stuff that happens when I get typing fast and I’m on autopilot, thinking too far ahead of where I’m actually at in terms of typing. It gets even worse when I’m writing with good ol’ pen and paper!
